message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1300000. It's a fantastic deal, and I'm sure it will be a great asset for your business. Let me know what you think!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I believe we can reach a more mutually beneficial agreement. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $1100000 for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I value our potential partnership, $1100000 is unfortunately below my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to come down to $1250000 to ensure a smooth transaction.  This price still reflects the significant value of the product.  Let's see if we can make this work!

I understand your position, Alice. I've reviewed the product again and believe we can find common ground. I am willing to increase my offer to $1200000 for the product. I hope this proposal will be acceptable to you.
